sentences.en: compasses and other instruments of navigation
Mechanics discovered problems with the plane's navigation system.
sentences.cn: 机械工发现飞机的导航系统存在问题。

sentences.en: Navigation becomes more difficult further up the river.
sentences.cn: 越往河的上游，航行越困难。

sentences.en: Navigation is difficult on this river because of hidden rocks.
sentences.cn: 由于多暗礁,在这条河上航行很困难.

sentences.en: On the other hand, moving persistent objects themselves can hamper navigation.
sentences.cn: 另一方面, 移动持久对象本身可能妨碍导航.

sentences.en: Pack ice around Iceland was becoming a threat to navigation.
sentences.cn: 冰岛周围的浮冰群曾一度对船只航行构成威胁。

sentences.en: Panning and zooming, especially when paired together, create navigation difficulties for users.
sentences.cn: 对于用户来说,平移和缩放一起使用时, 产生了更多的导航困难.

sentences.en: Sextant can be used for exploration and navigation .
sentences.cn: 六分仪可用于航海和勘探中。

sentences.en: Steam navigation has been opened up between the two cities.
sentences.cn: 这两个城市间已有轮船通航.

sentences.en: The aircraft engines, autopilot, and navigation system are absolutely reliable.
sentences.cn: 飞机发动机, 自动驾驶仪和导航系统绝对可靠.

sentences.en: The compass is an instrument of navigation.
The great importance of the quality of equipment for navigation should never be neglected.
sentences.cn: 导航设备的质量极为重要,不容忽视.

sentences.en: They will be helped by the very latest in navigation aids.
sentences.cn: 他们将会受益于最新的导航系统。

sentences.en: Use links for navigation, and buttons or butcons for action.
sentences.cn: 链接用于浏览导航, 按钮和图标按钮用于操作.

sentences.en: Using short, easily recognized words facilitates navigation with minimal conscious reading.
sentences.cn: 采用短且易于识别的文字,才能让用户用最少的有意识阅读在界面中导航.
